snippet.title: 7th Circuit chief dubious about reversal in Hague Convention case
snippet.description: I've read a lot of court opinions in my career -- majorities, dissents, concurring, en banc, per curiam, etc. -- but today was the first one I've ever seen labeled "dubitante." That's how Chief Judge Frank Easterbrook of the U.S. 7th Circuit Court of Appeals in Chicago characterizes
